Package org.jlab.epsci.ersap.std.cli

Class AbstractCommand

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jlab.epsci.ersap.std.cli.AbstractCommand
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.AutoCloseable, Command
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BaseCommand
    public abstract class AbstractCommand
extends java.lang.Object
implements Command
    Default class for new shell commands. The name and a brief description of the command are required. The command can access to the virtual terminal used by the shell, if needed.
